body: The way the story was written she could have done it in 2 chapters... for a story that took more Yuzuki 3 year, with all that time to think in my opinion was poorly written. Yuzuki made this series become work (one more in a sea of generic scenarios), nothing new, nothing else and nothing. Totally wasted potential.

I read that there is a 4 page epilogue in the   tank. Here is a sumamry of happenings in the epilogue 

the teacher gets arrested because he raped other girls

setsuna cut off contact with gin and move to countryside with her mother then born a boy and bringing up this kid as a single parent

tomoe pays a visit to her then talking about something when they were young and setsuna remember something sweet（just some promise） between her and gin and she starts crying

then setsuna tell tomoe she want to meet gin and talk to him，tomoe encourages her and said she loved setsuna for a long time 

the end
Yp uare obviously nto fam,liar with YnD's NTR works as  she likes open endings
If we knew this is how YnD really wanted to end it, she should have just l'm pretty sure this would have been better off just being left incomplete... What a shit ending.
